glsa.title: libcroco: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libcroco, the worst of which may have unspecified impacts.

background.p: libcroco is a standalone CSS2 parsing and manipulation library.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libcroco. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted CSS file possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or other unspecified impacts.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libcroco users should upgrade to the latest version:
